DOC.brief_summary: In early clinical research , 138 patient complete treatment Psoriasis Vulgaris Acitretin Capsules 8 week , result indicate 75 case effectively ( 54.3 % ) , 50 case invalid ( 36.2 % ) , 13 case serious ( 9.4 % ) . To investigate influence genetic factor curative effect find relationship genetic variant response Acitretin Capsules treatment Psoriasis Vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacogenomics Study Treatment Psoriasis Vulgaris Acitretin Capsules
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators analyze various level genetic factor , include : 1.To analysis key gene variant associate ADME affect efficacy Acitretin Capsules ; 2.Direct full genetic sequence MHC gene , explore genetic variation efficacy side effect ; 3 . Direct sequence exon gene patient response serious effectively , explore rare genetic variation may cause deterioration treatment Acitretin Capsules .
